state
Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
  state.Inventory

public class Inventory
extends Object

This class is part of the "Go Sunset" application. "Go Sunset" is a very simple, text based adventure game This command hold information about the players inventory. The inventory currently consists of the maximum and current weight and an array list of item objects. The way this is used is: Items can be removed and added to the list up to the maximum weight when the name of the item is supplied. The printInventory method can be called to print the items currently in the inventory if available. Else it prints that the inventory is empty.

Version:
2014/03/04
Author:
Louis Capitanchik, Joshua Mulcock, Alice Charterton, John Stones

Method Detail

addItem

public boolean addItem(Item newItem)
Attempts to add the item to the inventory, but will not do so if that would increase the weight beyond the defined maximum

Parameters:
newItem - The item to put in the inventory
Returns:
true if the item has successfully been added, false if it is too heavy

contains

public boolean contains(String itemName)
Searches the inventory for the specified item, returning whether or not it is contained within the inventory instance

Parameters:
itemName - A String containing the item that is being searched for
Returns:
Will return true if the item is inside the inventory, false if it is not

getItem

public Item getItem(String itemName)
Find the given item in the bag and returns it. Will return null if no item is found.

Parameters:
itemName - the name of the item that will be searched for
Returns:
the Item whose name matches the given string

printInventory

public void printInventory(String context)
If available, prints a list of the items in the inventory. If the inventory is empty, prints a message informing the player.

removeItem

public Item removeItem(String itemName)
Removes the first item in the inventory that has the given name and returns it. Will return null if no item is found.

Parameters:
itemName - The name of the item that will be removed
Returns:
the Item whose name matches the given string
